name: syl5eqner
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c0))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c0))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, c1))

|- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wne(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c2, c0)

comment: A chained equality inference for inequality. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2012.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 19-Nov-2019.)
